title: Situated Mathematics Education Design: Advanced Mathematical Knowledge Acquisition Process

context.prior_knowledge: Undergraduate-level foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and discipline-specific applied mathematics basics
context.additional_context: Personalized situational task design and feedback system operation using individual learning devices.

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems required in real workplace contexts within situational frameworks
Learners can explain the generation process and application principles of mathematical knowledge through situational tasks

In weekly feedback sessions with 3-5 peers over six weeks, learners document solutions to ≥12 math problems (optimization, differential equations) with ≥3 feedback iterations, and demonstrate approaches improving problem-solving efficiency by ≥20% in final assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
